A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has taken to killing the local pets, and killing Alice. In this movie, Alice’s son, Adam, and local policewoman Kathie Peil (Joyce Taylor) work together to destroy the cat.
